oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Roger Phillips, WSIX announcer of the Nashville Vols, from the Nashville Times, 1940
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A captioned photo from the Nashville Times (1940), about “Roger Phillips, WSIX announcer of the Nashville Vols games in the Southern League, is shown in an interview with Connie Mack, veteran manager of the Philadelphia Athletics of the American League. Mack, the 77-year-old Grand Old Man of Baseball, visited the WSIX studios while here last week on exhibition tour.” Forms part of the Nashville Times newspaper collection. 1 digital photo.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Phillips, Roger; Mack, Connie, 1862-1956
